data.system_settings: Windows 10 Developers Edition, Fall Creator's Update
data.actual_result: Button simply displays no text and is green.
data.expected_result: Button should display text saying "Join Call"
data.short_description: When in a group call, before joining the call the "Join Call" button does not display text, but just the green button.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create new group DM - Add two or more people - Create a call - Have the other users join the call - Leave the call
